Global: "Hey, you dropped our {0} on the floor!;My kids don't eat dirty things!;I've taught my children not to eat things that have been on the floor!;We don’t pay for food on the floor!;My family doesn't like filthy food!;Who wants to eat this {0} now, you think? Not me, not my kids!"
